trans-unit.source: Walks the array while sanitizing the contents.
trans-unit.target: 在清洁内容的同时巡视数组。

trans-unit.source: Walks through each of a user’s blogs to find the post with the most recent post_date_gmt.
trans-unit.target: 浏览用户的每个博客，以查找具有最新post_date_gmt的帖子。

trans-unit.source: Warning: $value is not escaped for ‘name’ $field. You must do it yourself, if required.
trans-unit.target: 警告：“名称” $ field的$ value不能转义。如果需要，您必须自己做。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Magic numbers within. Due to the potential different formats that the compressed data may be returned in, some "magic offsets" are needed to ensure proper decompression takes place. For a simple progmatic way to determine the magic offset in use, see: https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/18273
trans-unit.target: 警告：内含魔术数字。由于压缩数据可能以不同的格式返回，因此需要一些“魔术偏移”以确保进行适当的解压缩。有关确定使用中的魔术偏移量的简单编程方法，请参阅：https ://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/18273

trans-unit.source: Warning: This function may return Boolean FALSE, but may also return a non-Boolean value which evaluates to FALSE. For information about casting to booleans see the PHP documentation. Use the === operator for testing the return value of this function.
trans-unit.target: 警告：此函数可能返回布尔FALSE，但也可能返回非布尔值，其值为FALSE。有关转换为布尔值的信息，请参见PHP文档。使用 === 运算符测试此函数的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Warning: This function may return Boolean FALSE, but may also return a non-Boolean value which evaluates to FALSE. For information about casting to booleans see the PHP documentation. Use the === operator for testing the return value of this function.

Warning: this function will always return “false” until after comments_template() has been called. If you need to check for comments before calling comments_template(), use get_comments_number() instead.
Was used to add options for the privacy requests screens before they were separate files.
We avoid unnecessary table joins by allowing each clause to look for an existing table alias that is compatible with the query that it needs to perform.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过允许每个子句寻找与它需要执行的查询相兼容的现有表别名来避免不必要的表连接。

trans-unit.source: We can also edit the link to put them in front of the deactivate and edit link. Here is an example:
We can register a custom post type with the register_post_type function. This should not be hooked before init. So, the good option is to call it with an init hook.
We can use the user_search_columns filter to modify the search columns.
We cannot use wp_hash() because it is defined in pluggable.php which is not loaded until after plugins are loaded, which is too late to verify the recovery mode cookie.
trans-unit.target: 我们无法使用 wp_hash() ,因为它是在 pluggable.php 中定义的，直到加载插件后才加载，这太晚了，无法验证恢复模式cookie。

trans-unit.source: We modify these rules to be a bit stricter and only allow the wildcard character to be the full first component; that is, with the exclusion of the third rule.
trans-unit.target: 我们把这些规则修改得更严格一些,只允许通配符是完整的第一组成部分;也就是说,第三条规则除外。

trans-unit.source: We require Imagick 2.2.0 or greater, based on whether the queryFormats() method can be called statically.
trans-unit.target: 我们要求Imagick 2.2.0或更高版本,基于queryFormats()方法是否可以静态调用。

trans-unit.source: We use REMOTE_ADDR here directly. If you are behind a proxy, you should ensure that it is properly set, such as in wp-config.php, for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里直接使用 REMOTE_ADDR 。如果您使用代理，则应确保为您的环境正确设置了代理，例如在wp-config.php中。

trans-unit.source: We want to keep localhost and the site URL from being sent through the proxy server, because some proxies can not handle this. We also have the constant available for defining other hosts that won’t be sent through the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望避免通过代理服务器发送本地主机和站点URL，因为某些代理无法处理此问题。我们还有常量可用于定义不会通过代理发送的其他主机。

trans-unit.source: We want to keep localhost and the site URL from being sent through the proxy, because some proxies can not handle this. We also have the constant available for defining other hosts that won’t be sent through the proxy.

trans-unit.source: Week starts on translated Sunday and can be fetched by using 0 (zero). So the week starts with 0 (zero) and ends on Saturday with is fetched by using 6 (six).
trans-unit.target: 周从翻译后的周日开始,可以用0(0)取。因此,本周从0(0)开始,周六结束,用6(6)取。

trans-unit.source: Week. Default current week.
trans-unit.target: 周。默认为本周。

trans-unit.source: Well-behaved clients should expand and normalise these back to their full URI relation, however some naive clients may not resolve these correctly, so adding new CURIEs may break backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 乖巧的客户机应该将这些扩展和规范化回它们的完整URI关系,然而一些天真的客户机可能无法正确地解析这些,因此添加新的CURIEs可能会破坏向后的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: What columns to sort pages by, comma-separated. Accepts 'post_author', 'post_date', 'post_title', 'post_name', 'post_modified', 'menu_order', 'post_modified_gmt', 'post_parent', 'ID', 'rand', 'comment*count'. 'post*' can be omitted for any values that start with it. Default 'post_title'.
trans-unit.target: 要对页面进行排序的列,以逗号分隔。接受'post_author','post_date','post_title','post_name','post_modified','menu_order','post_modified_gmt','post_parent','ID','rand','comment*count'.以'post*'开头的值可以省略。默认为'post_title'。

What each tag will be replaced with in the rewrite part of the rewrite rule. The same correspondance applies here as with
What encoding the content used when it was compressed to send in the headers.
trans-unit.target: 当内容被压缩到头文件中发送时,使用的是什么编码。

trans-unit.source: What encoding types to accept and their priority values.
trans-unit.target: 接受什么样的编码类型及其优先值。

trans-unit.source: What rating to display avatars up to. Accepts 'G', 'PG', 'R', 'X', and are judged in that order. Default is the value of the 'avatar_rating' option.
trans-unit.target: 显示头像到什么等级。接受'G'、'PG'、'R'、'X',并依次判断。默认为'avatar_rating'选项的值。

trans-unit.source: What to link each image to. Default empty (links to the attachment page). Accepts 'file', 'none'.
trans-unit.target: 每张图片的链接内容。默认为空(链接到附件页)。接受'文件'、'无'。

trans-unit.source: What to show before the links appear. Default 'Bookmarks'.
trans-unit.target: 在链接出现之前要显示什么。默认的 "书签"。

trans-unit.source: When $do_deferred is false (is by default) and the comments have been set to be deferred, the post_id will be added to a queue, which will be updated at a later date and only updated once per post ID.
trans-unit.target: 当$do_deferred为false(默认情况下是),并且评论已经被设置为延迟,post_id将被添加到一个队列中,该队列将在以后更新,并且每个post ID只更新一次。

trans-unit.source: When WP_Error is returned, it does not mean that one of the plugins had errors. It means that one or more of the plugin file paths were invalid.
When WP_Error is returned, it does not mean that one of the plugins had errors. It means that one or more of the plugins file path was invalid.
trans-unit.target: 当WP_Error返回，但这并不意味着该插件的一个有错误。这意味着一个或多个插件文件路径无效。

trans-unit.source: When $context is set to ‘xml’, HTML entities are converted to their code points. For example, AT&T…&#XYZZY; is converted to AT&T…&#XYZZY;.

When WP_DEBUG is true, all PHP notices are reported. WordPress will also display internal notices: when a deprecated WordPress function, function argument, or file is used. Deprecated code may be removed from a later version.
trans-unit.target: 当 WP_DEBUG 为true时，将报告所有PHP声明。WordPress还将显示内部通知：使用不推荐使用的WordPress函数，函数参数或文件时。不推荐使用的代码可能会从更高版本中删除。

trans-unit.source: When WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY is true, WordPress will force errors to be displayed. WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY defaults to true. Defining it as null prevents WordPress from changing the global configuration setting. Defining WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY as false will force errors to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当 WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY 为true时，WordPress将强制显示错误。 WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY 默认为true。将其定义为null可防止WordPress更改全局配置设置。将 WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY 定义为false将强制隐藏错误。

trans-unit.source: When WP_DEBUG_LOG is true, errors will be logged to wp-content/debug.log. When WP_DEBUG_LOG is a valid path, errors will be logged to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 当 WP_DEBUG_LOG 为true时，错误将记录到 wp-content/debug.log 中。当 WP_DEBUG_LOG 是有效路径时，错误将记录到指定文件中。

trans-unit.source: When WP_DEBUG is enabled, errors and information may be disclosed to site visitors, or it may be logged to a publicly accessible file.
trans-unit.target: 当WP_DEBUG被启用时,错误和信息可能会被披露给网站访问者,或者被记录到一个可公开访问的文件中。

trans-unit.source: When WP_DEBUG is enabled, errors and information may be disclosed to site visitors, or logged to a publicly accessible file.

When a changeset is updated but remains an auto-draft, ensure the post_date for the auto-draft posts remains the same so that it will be garbage-collected at the same time by wp_delete_auto_drafts(). Otherwise, if the changeset is updated to be a draft then update the posts to have a far-future post_date so that they will never be garbage collected unless the changeset post itself is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当变更集更新但仍为自动草稿时，请确保自动草稿帖子的post_date保持不变，以便同时由 wp_delete_auto_drafts() 进行垃圾收集。否则，如果将变更集更新为草稿，则将帖子更新为具有较远的post_date，以便除非删除变更集帖子本身，否则永远不会对其进行垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: When a changeset is updated to be a persistent draft or to be scheduled for publishing, then transition any dependent auto-drafts to a draft status so that they likewise will not be garbage-collected but also so that they can be edited in the admin before publishing since there is not yet a post/page editing flow in the Customizer. See #39752.
trans-unit.target: 当一个变化集被更新为持久性的草稿或被安排发布时,那么将任何附属的自动草稿转换为草稿状态,这样它们同样不会被垃圾收集,而且还可以在发布前在管理员处进行编辑,因为在自定义器中还没有一个帖子/页面编辑流程。参见#39752。

trans-unit.source: When a filter hook is deprecated, the apply_filters() call is replaced with apply_filters_deprecated(), which triggers a deprecation notice and then fires the original filter hook.
trans-unit.target: 当一个过滤器钩已过时，该apply_filters（）调用被替换apply_filters_deprecated（） ，这将触发已取消通知，然后触发该原始滤波器钩。

trans-unit.source: When a multidimensional setting gets aggregated, all of its preview and update calls get combined into one call, greatly improving performance.
trans-unit.target: 当一个多维度的设置被聚合后,其所有的预览和更新调用都会被合并到一个调用中,大大提高了性能。

trans-unit.source: When a plugin is activated, all active plugins are loaded, then the plugin is activated. The plugin’s activation hook is run and then the page is immediately redirected

When a plugin is activated, the action ‘activate_PLUGINNAME’ hook is called. In the name of this hook, PLUGINNAME is replaced with the name of the plugin, including the optional subdirectory. For example, when the plugin is located in wp-content/plugins/sampleplugin/sample.php, then the name of this hook will become ‘activate_sampleplugin/sample.php’.
trans-unit.target: 激活插件后，将调用操作“ activate_PLUGINNAME”挂钩。在该钩子的名称中，PLUGINNAME被替换为插件的名称，包括可选的子目录。例如，当插件位于wp-content / plugins / sampleplugin / sample.php中时，该挂钩的名称将变为'activate_sampleplugin / sample.php'。

trans-unit.source: When a plugin is deactivated, the action ‘deactivate_PLUGINNAME’ hook is called. In the name of this hook, PLUGINNAME is replaced with the name of the plugin, including the optional subdirectory. For example, when the plugin is located in wp-content/plugins/sampleplugin/sample.php, then the name of this hook will become ‘deactivate_sampleplugin/sample.php’.
trans-unit.target: 停用插件后，将调用操作“ deactivate_PLUGINNAME”挂钩。在该钩子的名称中，PLUGINNAME被替换为插件的名称，包括可选的子目录。例如，当插件位于wp-content / plugins / sampleplugin / sample.php中时，该挂钩的名称将变为'deactivate_sampleplugin / sample.php'。

trans-unit.source: When a post is saved, the post status is "transitioned" from one status to another, though this does not always mean the status has actually changed before and after the save. This function fires a number of action hooks related to that transition: the generic ‘transition_post_status’ action, as well as the dynamic hooks ‘$old_status_to_$new_status’ and ‘$new_status_$post->post_type’. Note that the function does not transition the post object in the database.
trans-unit.target: 保存帖子时，帖子状态从一个状态“转换”到另一状态，尽管这并不总是意味着状态在保存之前和之后实际上已经更改。该函数触发与该转换相关的许多动作挂钩：通用的“ transition_post_status”动作，以及动态挂钩“ $ old_status_to_ $ new_status”和“ $ new_status_ $ post-> post_type”。请注意，该函数不会转换数据库中的post对象。

trans-unit.source: When a textdomain is encountered for the first time, we try to load the translation file from wp-content/languages, removing the need to call load_plugin_texdomain() or load_theme_texdomain().
trans-unit.target: 首次遇到文本域时，我们尝试从 wp-content/languages 加载翻译文件，从而无需调用load_plugin_texdomain（）或load_theme_texdomain（）。

When allowing for automatic generation of the name and ID parameters, keep in mind that the incrementor for your sidebar can change over time depending on what other plugins and themes are installed.

trans-unit.source: When an attachment is permanently deleted, the file will also be removed. Deletion removes all post meta fields, taxonomy, comments, etc. associated with the attachment (except the main post).
trans-unit.target: 当附件被永久删除时,该文件也将被删除。删除会删除所有与附件相关的帖子元字段、分类、评论等(主帖除外)。

trans-unit.source: When both TinyMCE and Quicktags are used, set which editor is shown on page load. Default empty.
trans-unit.target: 当同时使用TinyMCE和Quicktags时,设置页面加载时显示哪个编辑器。默认为空。

trans-unit.source: When called, this renders out the bulk-actions drop-down. To use this, you will still need to manually wrap your list table (including search box) in a form.
When calling switch_to_blog() repeatedly, either call restore_current_blog() each time, or save the original blog ID until the end and call switch_to_blog() with that and do:
When converting the object to a string, the theme name is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当把对象转换为字符串时,将返回主题名称。

trans-unit.source: When editing a PHP file, loopback requests will be made to the admin and the homepage to attempt to see if there is a fatal error introduced. If so, the PHP change will be reverted.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑一个PHP文件时,会向管理员和主页发出回环请求,以尝试查看是否有一个致命的错误被引入。如果有,PHP的改变将被还原。

trans-unit.source: When in preview, hook to ‘customize_register’ for settings after WordPress is loaded so that all filters have been initialized (e.g. Widget Visibility).
trans-unit.target: 处于预览状态时，在加载WordPress之后挂钩到“ customize_register”进行设置，以便所有过滤器都已初始化（例如，小部件可见性）。

trans-unit.source: When included, the default output for this function is the admin panel which will be shown in the top of the theme. It should be kept in the footer for every theme because most of the plugin bind their script files or functions to this hook.

When it comes time to output enqueued stylesheets, WP_Styles can print them, or accumulate them in instance variables ($print_html for external and $print_code for embedded). This behaviour is controlled by the boolean instance variable $do_concat. If true, output is concatenated to the appropriate instance variable; if false, it’s printed.

When loading many objects of a given type, such as posts in a WP_Query loop, it often makes sense to prime various metadata caches at the beginning of the loop. This means fetching all relevant metadata with a single database query, a technique that has the potential to improve performance dramatically in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 当加载许多给定类型的对象（例如WP_Query循环中的帖子）时，在循环开始时预备各种元数据缓存通常很有意义。这意味着可以通过单个数据库查询来获取所有相关的元数据，该技术在某些情况下可能会显着提高性能。

trans-unit.source: When mbstring.func_overload is in use for multi-byte encodings, the results from strlen() and similar functions respect the utf8 characters, causing binary data to return incorrect lengths.
trans-unit.target: 当 mbstring.func_overload 用于多字节编码时,strlen()和类似函数的结果会尊重 utf8 字符,导致二进制数据返回错误的长度。

trans-unit.source: When passing this function on terms and taxonomies, a third parameter is added.
When previewing, ensures the proper previewing widgets are used.
trans-unit.target: 预览时,确保使用正确的预览小部件。

trans-unit.source: When registering a post type, always register your taxonomies using the taxonomies argument. If you do not, the taxonomies and post type will not be recognized as connected when using filters such as parse_query or pre_get_posts. This can lead to unexpected results and failures.
When registering sidebars a ‘description’ parameter can be included that describes the sidebar for display on the widget administration panel.
trans-unit.target: 注册侧栏时，可以包含“描述”参数，该参数描述侧栏以显示在小部件管理面板上。

trans-unit.source: When registering widgets, the options can also include ‘description’ that describes the widget for display on the widget administration panel or in the theme.
trans-unit.target: 注册窗口小部件时，这些选项还可以包括“描述”，描述要在窗口小部件管理面板或主题中显示的窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: When scheduling your own actions to run using the WordPress Cron service, you have to specify which interval WordPress should use. WordPress has its own, limited, default set of intervals, or “schedules”, including ‘hourly’, ‘twicedaily’, and ‘daily’. This filter allows you to add your own intervals to the default set.

When setting $defer to true, all post comment counts will not be updated until $defer is set to false. When $defer is set to false, then all previously deferred updated post comment counts will then be automatically updated without having to call wp_update_comment_count() after.
trans-unit.target: 将$ defer设置为true时，除非$ defer设置为false，否则所有帖子评论计数都不会更新。当$ defer设置为false时，所有先前延迟的更新后的评论计数将自动更新，而无需在之后调用wp_update_comment_count（）。

trans-unit.source: When specifying $places ensure that you are using the EP_* constants (or a combination of them using the bitwise OR operator) as their values are not guaranteed to remain static (especially EP_ALL).
trans-unit.target: 指定$ places时，请确保使用的是EP_ *常量（或使用按位OR运算符将其组合），因为不能保证其值保持静态（尤其是 EP_ALL ）。

trans-unit.source: When supplied, the setting title will be wrapped in a <label> element, its for attribute populated with this value.
trans-unit.target: 提供时，设置标题将包装在 <label> 元素中，其 for 属性将填充此值。

trans-unit.source: When switching a theme via the Customizer, supply any previously-configured sidebars_widgets from the target theme as the initial sidebars_widgets setting. Also store the old theme’s existing settings so that they can be passed along for storing in the sidebars_widgets theme_mod when the theme gets switched.
trans-unit.target: 通过定制程序切换主题时，请提供目标主题中所有先前配置的sidebars_widgets作为初始sidebars_widgets设置。还存储旧主题的现有设置，以便在切换主题时可以将其传递以存储在sidebars_widgets theme_mod中。

trans-unit.source: When switching themes, filter the Customizer setting old_sidebars_widgets_data to supply initial $sidebars_widgets before they were overridden by retrieve_widgets(). The value for old_sidebars_widgets_data gets set in the old theme’s sidebars_widgets theme_mod.
trans-unit.target: 切换主题时，请过滤Customizer设置old_sidebars_widgets_data以提供初始$ sidebars_widgets，然后再将它们替换为retrieve_widgets（）。old_sidebars_widgets_data的值在旧主题的sidebars_widgets theme_mod中设置。

trans-unit.source: When switching themes, the retrieve_widgets() function is run when the Customizer initializes, and then the new sidebars_widgets here get supplied as the default value for the sidebars_widgets option.
trans-unit.target: 切换主题时，Customizer初始化时将运行retrieve_widgets（）函数，然后在此处将新的sidebars_widgets作为sidebars_widgets选项的默认值提供。

trans-unit.source: When switching to a locale, translations for this locale must be loaded from scratch.
trans-unit.target: 当切换到一个地方语言时,这个地方语言的翻译必须从头开始加载。

trans-unit.source: When the ‘plugin_action_links_(plugin file name)’ filter is called, it is passed one parameter: the links to show on the plugins overview page in an array.
When the get_the_excerpt filter is called, the filter function is passed a single argument containing the post excerpt.
When the cookie expires.
trans-unit.target: 当cookie过期时。

When the function returns, the value will be the processed/sanitized $args plus a "found_avatar" guess. Pass as a reference.
trans-unit.target: 当函数返回时,值将是经过处理/消毒的$args加上一个 "found_avatar "的猜测。作为参考传递。

trans-unit.source: When the hook is fired on the back end, $_callback is populated with an array containing the widget object, see $callback.
trans-unit.target: 当钩子在后端被触发时,$_callback会被填充一个包含widget对象的数组,见$callback。

trans-unit.target: 当钩子在前端被触发时,$callback是一个包含widget对象的数组,在后端触发时,$callback是'wp_widget_control',见$_callback。在后端触发时,$callback是'wp_widget_control',见$_callback。

trans-unit.source: When the plugin consists of only one file and is (as by default) located at wp-content/plugins/sample.php the name of this hook will be ‘activate_sample.php’.
trans-unit.target: 当插件仅包含一个文件并且位于（默认情况下）位于wp-content / plugins / sample.php时，此挂钩的名称将为'activate_sample.php'。

trans-unit.source: When the plugin consists of only one file and is (as by default) located at wp-content/plugins/sample.php the name of this hook will be ‘deactivate_sample.php’.
trans-unit.target: 当该插件仅包含一个文件并且（默认情况下）位于wp-content / plugins / sample.php时，此挂钩的名称将为'deactivate_sample.php'。

trans-unit.source: When the post and page is permanently deleted, everything that is tied to it is deleted also. This includes comments, post meta fields, and terms associated with the post.
trans-unit.target: 当帖子和页面被永久删除时,与之相关的所有内容也会被删除。这包括评论、帖子元字段和与帖子相关的术语。

trans-unit.source: When the post is the same as the current requested page the function will handle the pagination arguments too.
trans-unit.target: 当帖子与当前请求的页面相同时,该函数也会处理分页参数。

trans-unit.source: When the rewrite rules are built by WP_Rewrite::rewrite_rules(), all of these extra permastructs are passed to WP_Rewrite::generate_rewrite_rules() which transforms them into the regular expressions that many love to hate.
trans-unit.target: 当重写规则由WP_Rewrite :: rewrite_rules（）构建时，所有这些额外的永久结构都将传递给WP_Rewrite :: generate_rewrite_rules（），这会将它们转换为许多人讨厌的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: When the site was last updated, in SQL datetime format. Default is the value of $registered.
trans-unit.target: 网站最后一次更新的时间,以SQL日期时间格式表示。默认值是$registered。

trans-unit.source: When the site was registered, in SQL datetime format. Default is the current time.
trans-unit.target: 网站注册的时间,SQL日期时间格式。默认为当前时间。

trans-unit.source: When the translated string is returned, it is everything before the pipe, not including the pipe character. If there is no pipe in the translated text then everything is returned.

trans-unit.source: When this code is called from a page, it checks to see if the user viewing the page is logged in. If the user is not logged in, they are redirected to the login page. The user is redirected in such a way that, upon logging in, they will be sent directly to the page they were originally trying to access.
When this filter hook is evaluated in wp_filter_comment(), the comment author’s URL string is passed.
trans-unit.target: 在wp_filter_comment（）中评估此过滤器挂钩时，将传递注释作者的URL字符串。

trans-unit.target: 当与$number一起使用时,定义要返回的结果页。当与$offset一起使用时,$offset优先。默认值为1。

trans-unit.target: 以这种方式使用query_posts（）时，参数的带引号的部分必须以＆符号开头。

trans-unit.target: 当使用the_post_thumbnail（）或相关函数时，默认情况下会使用“ post-thumbnail”图像大小，但可以根据需要指定其他大小。

trans-unit.source: When using this filter it’s important to check if you’re filtering the content in the main query with the conditionals is_main_query() and in_the_loop(). The main post query can be thought of as the primary post loop that displays the main content for a post, page or archive. Without these conditionals you could unintentionally be filtering the content for custom loops in sidebars, footers, or elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 使用此过滤器时，检查是否要使用条件is_main_query（）和in_the_loop（）过滤主查询中的内容很重要。可以将主要帖子查询视为显示帖子，页面或档案的主要内容的主要帖子循环。没有这些条件，您可能会无意间在侧边栏，页脚或其他地方过滤自定义循环的内容。

trans-unit.source: When you are using the array form, you do not need to supply line breaks (

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of this class passing an array of arguments to it’s constructor, the class will automatically run the query method and return an array of comments. See __construct() method for all accepted arguments and get_comments() method to all possible return values.
trans-unit.target: 当您创建此类的实例并将其参数数组传递给其构造函数时，该类将自动运行查询方法并返回一个注释数组。有关所有接受的参数，请参见__construct（）方法；对于所有可能的返回值，请参见get_comments（）方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of this class passing an array of arguments to its constructor, the class will automatically run the query method and return an instance of WP_Comment_Query. See __construct() method for all accepted arguments and get_comments() method to all possible return values.

When you use the wp_query object to run a query not all tables are queried by default. For example, a query on the blog archive will only query the posts table. If you wanted to display posts that have specific meta value you will have to alter the wp_query object to include the required meta key.
Whenever a series of images are linked to the attachment page, it will put a ‘next image link’ with the images when viewed in the attachment page.

Where "recovery_mode" is a constant string, iat is the time the cookie was generated at, rand is a randomly generated password that is also used as a session identifier and signature is an hmac of the preceding 3 parts.

trans-unit.source: Where ‘filter_function_name‘ is the function WordPress should call when the excerpt is being retrieved. Note that the filter function must return the excerpt after it is finished processing, or page sections showing an excerpt will be blank, and other plugins also filtering the excerpt may generate errors.

Where ‘filter_function_name’ is the function WordPress should call when the content is being retrieved. Note that the filter function must return the content after it is finished processing, or the title will be blank and other plugins also filtering the content may generate errors.
trans-unit.target: 其中“ filter_function_name”是WordPress在检索内容时应调用的函数。请注意，过滤器函数必须在完成处理后返回内容，否则标题将为空白，并且其他过滤内容的插件也可能会产生错误。

trans-unit.source: Where to show the post type in the admin menu. To work, $show_ui must be true. If true, the post type is shown in its own top level menu. If false, no menu is shown. If a string of an existing top level menu (eg. 'tools.php' or 'edit.php?post_type=page'), the post type will be placed as a sub-menu of that. Default is value of $show_ui.
trans-unit.target: 在管理菜单中显示帖子类型的位置。为了工作,$show_ui必须为true。如果为真,帖子类型将显示在它自己的顶层菜单中。如果为false,则不显示菜单。如果一个现有的顶级菜单的字符串(例如'tools.php'或'edit.php?post_type=page'),帖子类型将被放置为一个子菜单。默认值为$show_ui。

trans-unit.source: Which users?

While $size will accept an array, it is better to register a size with add_image_size() so that a cropped version is generated. It’s much more efficient than having to find the closest-sized image and then having the browser scale down the image.

trans-unit.source: You block external URL requests by defining WP_HTTP_BLOCK_EXTERNAL as true in your wp-config.php file and this will only allow localhost and your site to make requests. The constant WP_ACCESSIBLE_HOSTS will allow additional hosts to go through for requests. The format of the WP_ACCESSIBLE_HOSTS constant is a comma separated list of hostnames to allow, wildcard domains are supported, eg *.wordpress.org will allow for all subdomains of wordpress.org to be contacted.

You block external URL requests by defining WP_HTTP_BLOCK_EXTERNAL as true in your wp-config.php file and this will only allow localhost and your site to make requests. The constant WP_ACCESSIBLE_HOSTS will allow additional hosts to go through for requests. The format of the WP_ACCESSIBLE_HOSTS constant is a comma separated list of hostnames to allow, wildcard domains are supported, eg *.wordpress.org will allow for all subdomains of wordpress.org to be contacted.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过在您的wp-config.php文件中定义WP_HTTP_BLOCK_EXTERNAL为true来阻止外部的URL请求,这将只允许localhost和您的网站进行请求。常量WP_ACCESSIBLE_HOSTS将允许其他主机通过请求。WP_ACCESSIBLE_HOSTS常量的格式是一个逗号分隔的主机名列表,支持通配符域,例如*.wordpress.org将允许wordpress.org的所有子域被联系。

You can create options without values and then update the values later. Existing options will not be updated and checks are performed to ensure that you aren’t adding a protected WordPress option. Care should be taken to not name options the same as the ones which are protected.

trans-unit.source: You can include the previous and next links in the list by setting the ‘prev_next’ argument to true, which it is by default. You can set the previous text, by using the ‘prev_text’ argument. You can set the next text by setting the ‘next_text’ argument.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve anything that you can using the get_bloginfo() function. Everything will be stripped of tags and characters converted, when the values are retrieved for use in the feeds.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve information about the columns of the most recent query result with get_col_info. This can be useful when a function has returned an OBJECT whose properties you don’t know. The function will output the desired information from the specified column, or an array with information on all columns from the query result if no column is specified.

trans-unit.source: You can use this function in themes and plugins. However, if you use it in a theme, your post type will disappear from the admin if a user switches away from your theme. See Must Use Plugins If you want to keep your changes e.g. post type, even if you switch between your themes.

You can’t call this function from within the hook you would like to remove actions from. For example adding an action to wp_footer that calls remove_all_actions(‘wp_footer’) will cause an infinite loop condition because the while loop suddenly doesn’t have a next value. You do not need to serialize values, if the value needs to be serialize, then it will be serialized before it is set.
trans-unit.target: 不需要对值进行序列化,如果需要对值进行序列化,那么在设置之前就会对其进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to serialize values. If the value needs to be serialized, then it will be serialized before it is inserted into the database. Remember, resources can not be serialized or added as an option.
trans-unit.target: 你不需要对值进行序列化。如果需要对值进行序列化,那么它将在插入数据库之前被序列化。记住,资源不能序列化,也不能作为选项添加。
